mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept d ON d.deptid=c.deptid WHERE d.deptname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deptname},'%');

SELECT count(1) FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept a ON a.deptid = c.deptid LEFT JOIN device_info d ON d.carid = c.id LEFT JOIN device_last_position l ON l.carid=c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.deptid = #{id}
AND l.carstatus IN (1,2) and c.car_service_status = 0
AND l.carstatus IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) and c.car_service_status = 0
and c.car_service_status != 0
